Package ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.snakes

Class Challenger

java.lang.Object
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.snakes.AbstractSnakeAI
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.snakes.Challenger
@Deprecated
public final class Challenger
extends AbstractSnakeAI
Deprecated.
Old apiv0 and badly coded
Challenger snake. This class is the "Nessegrev-challenge" snake on Battlesnake. This snake was made only to hard-code few rule to complete some challenge. Nothing to see here. It a mess, it gonna stay like that. Probably still in API v0, and this is mostly short test, hand made, without thinking. Please save yourself and don't look at this code If you do, you'll may find funny comments, and crazy code...
Version:
Summer 2020
Author:
carl.lajeunesse

    • computeSpace

      private void computeSpace​(int posX, int posY, int value, int[][] board)
      Deprecated.
      Recursive function to "flood" value. It's assign the value to the board [ x ] [ y] then recall this function for adjacent square with the same value
      Parameters:
      posX - the X position
      posY - the Y position
      value - the value to assign
      board - the board (array of value)

    • flood

      private void flood​(int posX, int posY, int value, int[][] board)
      Deprecated.
      Recursive function to "flood" positive value. It's assign the value to the board [ x ] [ y] then recall this function for adjacent square with value - 1
      Parameters:
      posX - the X position
      posY - the Y position
      value - the value to assign
      board - the board (array of value)

    • count5000

      private int count5000()
      Deprecated.
      Scan the space[][] to count empty square. And put square[][] back to 0 value why count 5000... I don't remember
      Returns:
      the count of empty space

    • floodEnemy

      private void floodEnemy​(int posX, int posY, int value, int[][] board)
      Deprecated.
      Recursive function to "flood" negative value. It's assign the value to the board [ x ] [ y] then recall this function for adjacent square with value - "floodEnemyGap "
      Parameters:
      posX - the X position
      posY - the Y position
      value - the value to assign
      board - the board (array of value)
